definition: surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale

sentences.english: The public that professes such admiration and support for our fighting men and women are not interested.
sentences.chinese: 公衆坦陳對於戰鬥人員的崇敬和支持不感興趣。

sentences.english: Thiessens confessed to the rest of the group last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年，西塞斯向小組的其他成員坦陳此事。

sentences.english: But Iwill always be honest with you about the challenges we face.
sentences.chinese: 但我會向你們坦陳我們所面對的挑釁。

sentences.english: Butt I will always be honest with you about the challenges we face.
sentences.chinese: 但我將總是會向你們坦陳我們所面臨的挑戰。

sentences.english: Alexis then admits that he has fallen in love with her.
sentences.chinese: 這時，亞歷克西斯向她坦陳，他已經愛上了她。
